RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: PhD pelo King s College, University of London, Department of Portuguese and Brazilian Studies (1996); Doutoramento Lingue e letterature iberoamericane (X ciclo), Universit di Palermo (1999). Atualmente docente em Universit degli Studi L'Orientale, Universit degli Studi Suor Orsola Benincasa, UNINT - Roma. Tem experincia na rea de Letras, com nfase em Literaturas Estrangeiras Modernas
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: PhD from King?s College ? University of London, Department of Portuguese and Brazilian Studies (1996);doctorate at Dottorato di Ricerca in Letterature Iberoamericane from Universit degli Studi di Palermo (1999). Currently she is teaching at Universit degli Studi L'Orientale and Universit degli Studi Suor Orsola Benincasa. Has experience in Language, focusing on Modern Foreign Literatures
